personalNotes:
Phase 2: Google Calendar Integration where selecting a time from the dropdown (Tomorrow, This Week, Next Week) automatically books the task to your Google Calendar, and Phase 3: Mark Done + Completion Tracking where you can click a button to mark tasks as complete (whether scheduled or not), which updates the visual state and syncs everything to your notes.json file. These two phases will cost approximately 5-6 more Manus credits and take 3-4 hours of Manus work to complete the entire automated scheduling system you envisioned.

---

Add a "Details" button to the Homework Dashboard. When clicked, the button should trigger the "check rating" feature. after I answer the questions upon trigger then I also want it to calculate the time based on AI  the calculation made by the AI. This task must be completed by the end of the day today. I also don't like that icon for the green yellow cause I think the time is good enough in terms of display of information.
familyNotes: write family members about march schedule with line
jobHuntingNotes: look for jobs in the AI sector in company such as AI: Claude, Manus. chatgpt
